[CDF-25591] Spaces dump support (#2006)

# Description

Right now user can only dump spaces which are linked to a data models.
This PR adds support to dumping instance spaces.

<img width="561" height="72" alt="Screenshot 2025-09-24 at 1 58 37â€¯PM"
src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fca7649a-e726-4b24-9061-6e9fa0dfe374"
/>


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- Support dumping instance spaces, `cdf dump spaces`.

## templates

No changes.
